tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited her for my pregnancy check up from the 2nd month and was happy and satisfied with her treatment. I had water breakdown on 7th month  in the middle of the night I called her and she immediately picked up the phone and asked me to get admitted in the hospital. My daughter was born premature but healthy. Its because of her that my daughter came into this world and is now healthy and fine.  Dr Ray comes with lots of experience *** ********* *** I am totally satisfied with her way of treatment.

tags: None
review: Met the doctor, I had some gynaecological problem. I would like to recommend the doctor, she was listening to my problems, She was kind. I would give rating 4.5/5 for satisfaction. I got to know about the doctor from Practo I gotta see her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was suggested a medical abortion which failed miserably following which I had to opt for a surgical abortion. However, Dr. Roy behaved extremely impatiently and rudely ***** **** * ***** **** *** ** ******* **********  **** *** *** *** ***** **** *** ******** ** **** *** There was a massive difference in how Dr. Roy behaved with women who would carry their pregnancies to term and how she would behave with me or my partner. 
I was 21 during the abortion and it would really help of I had a more supportive doctor because the whole experience with Dr. Piya Roy was nothing short of traumatic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had total 3 sessions when took my wife to visit Dr. Piya Roy for treatment, instead we were only given tests after tests with no resolution or treatment. Also after paying Rs1200 for each session of hard earned money it really gives disappointment and dissatisfaction when Doctor does not explain matter clearly rather she feels patient knows the terminologies and it's rootcauses. If we tend to ask more info she feels irritated and shows us her frustration on our face keep telling that so many patients visit her so she cant give time , is this acceptable??My question is if we knew everything, why would we pay to visit you?? Also to highlight she gives extremely less time to discuss with patients on the issues even when you are paying more than 1000 INR of your hard earned money. Feels so wasted !! Utterly disappointed !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited her for lower abdominal pain due to infection. *** ****** **** ** *** *********** ******** * *** ************ ***** ***** Moreover, she was more worried about my hymen than the severe infection I was going through. *** ********** ***** **** *** ****** ********* ******** ******* ******* **** *** ******* ****** ******* ** ** ** *** ********* When I asked for contraceptive injections rather than the pills, because of the severe side effects I experience due to a gastrointestinal problem, she didn't explain any pros and cons of it *** **** ****** ** ******** *** ******** *** ****** **** *** **** ***** Also she is in a hurry always.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: **** ********* *************** ** ** *** ******* She just gave seconds, not even a minute to attend my pregnant wife. The second visit was even worse. The prescribed medicines were not explained at all.The AMRI experience was good before I met her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was superb.. Very nice behavior. I am suffering from pcod problem so consult with her..she gaves me some tests let's see what happens when I get the reports...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Her very presence helps the patient to relax. Im 7 months pregnant and im consulting her from my 4th month. Never has been a single checkup where she did not greet us with that smile of hers. Her behaviour is another thing that i love about her. Im happy and relieved that she is my consulting doc and the responsibility of bringing my baby into this world lies in her able hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** ********** **** ****** Her approach towards patients is not appropriate. *** ******** *** ******** ******* ***** *** *********** I was not at all satisfied with my visit and later visited another doctor *** *** ****** ***** My 650 Rs is gone in vain ** **** ********** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all the doctor came so late and so she was in so much hurry that her assistant even didn't shut the door, probably gave my partner and me 3mins at max. We are paying so much for this kind of service. I'll never visit this doctor again. Will never suggest anyone to visit her. ******* ***** ********* ******** ** *** ******* ***** ****** ******** **** **** **** ****** ** **** ***** ********** Please do not visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have pcos. I am suffering (often) from period problems.   At the severe phase I went near her then she said me to lose weight and I told her to give me a diet chart though she was very busy that day. she never misbehave with me. Even she sometimes recommends medicine by phone calls . When I go near her ? she welcome me a smiling face. I am now under her treatment. Excellent experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have no words to thanks Dr. Piya Roy, she a blessing in my life. I visited her for my pregnancy checkup n delivery. She always has that sweet smile on her face that will help all patients to forget their worries. No extra hidden  charges, no unnecessary test, no extra medicine recommended. She is the best doctor a pregnant woman can have. 
Her consoling words are magical

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: **** *** ****** **** ********** ** **** ** **** *** *** ** ******* ** *** ******** *** * ***** ***** **** ********** she is in extreme hurry, lacks a personal touch and hardly went into medical history of my ward. Her explanation of the issues lacks substance. I would not advise

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Vaginal Infection Treatment,Pregnancy Check Up,Child Birth Education,Menstrual Disorders in Adolescent Girls,Family Planning,
review: She ** **** ********* ********. explain everything in very detail....very very friendly and polite... always reply to the calls in any emergency..very jolly doctor *** *** ********* ** **** *** ******************** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** ** *** **** ** *** it is she only to whom I have visited for my pregnancy twice in a gap of 5 yrs. both the time her warmth of behaviour and smile touched me and removed all my worries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She's always in a hurry, doesn't listen to you properly, and is unempathetic. She hardly checks you for two minutes, after making you wait for an hour.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: **** ****** recommended to many friends and colleagues we knew the doctor since last 10 years from EEDF

tags: None
review: Very warm and friendly, provided a amicable solution to my problem. Will visit her again in a few days' time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is totally amazing .. she is so friendly and treats so well I will totally recommend her. I was having problem of cysts and from her treatment I am fine now my periods are regular and on time.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Plz help for you to the right place for you and your team and the other day and night and the family of four years ago
